vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
δραχμ-ή, ἡ,
(δράσσομαι, properly as much as one can hold in the hand,[Refs 1st c.AD+]
__I a weight, drachm, [κρεῶν] probably in [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__I.2 a silver coin, drachma, worth six obols, [Refs 5th c.BC+], etc. [The penultimate is long in [Refs 5th c.BC+]: δαρχμή is found in [Refs 5th c.AD+]; compare δαρκνά.]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
silver coin, drachma
a drachma, an Attic silver coin of nearly the same value as the Roman denarius, Lk. 15:8, 9*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: dracma (moneda griega hecha de plata con valor aproximado de un denario)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: xu bạc; đồng bạc; đồng đắc-ma
